trait.name: Wounded Fury
entries: While it has 10 hit points or fewer, the quaggoth has advantage on attack rolls. In addition, it deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to any target it hits with a melee attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The quaggoth makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.
